features: Browse and search for medicines with detailed information
Order medicines and upload prescriptions for verification
Track the status of your orders in real-time
Admin can add and manage medicines with full control over the platform
heading: A fullstack online medicine ordering platform.
description: Medi Sphere is an online medicine ordering platform where users can browse, search, and purchase medicines easily. It features secure user authentication, a user-friendly interface, and a responsive design for seamless access across devices.

features: Explore a wide range of cycles with detailed specifications
Secure online payments for hassle-free purchases
Track your cycle order status from dispatch to delivery
Admin can manage cycle listings, inventory, and orders
heading: A fullstack cycle store
description: Cycle Sphere is a modern bicycle marketplace where users can explore, list, and buy cycles. The platform offers clean UI, dynamic filtering, and a smooth user experience tailored for cycling enthusiasts.

features: Save desired properties for future reference
Registered owners gain access to special features
Admin has full authority for website management
heading: A fullstack real estate website.
description: A real estate web application built with the MERN stack, showcasing key features such as property listings, user interactions, and dynamic content. This ongoing project demonstrates my ability to develop modern, full-stack web applications with a focus on functionality and clean design.

features: Registration enables roles - Student, Teacher, and Admin.
Approved teachers customize classes, add content, and manage enrolled students.
Students log in, explore classes, and enrol in courses of interest.
heading: A fullstack learning website.
description: Discover Learn Sphere, a robust online education platform designed for immersive learning experiences. From dynamic course content to user-friendly navigation, this project showcases my commitment to creating a seamless and engaging learning environment.
